Naming/BlockParameterName.description:
Description

Checks for block parameter names that contain capital letters, end in numbers, or do not meet a minimal length.
Naming/BlockParameterName.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

MinNameLength: 1 (type: int)
AllowNamesEndingInNumbers: True (type: bool)
AllowedNames: [] (type: list)
ForbiddenNames: [] (type: list)
